__e: If I don't, a lot of people...
Scores of people get ready for the show.
Because he let countless people die to save... one.
Countless lives throughout history have been lost to make sure of that.
If not for you and your ladies, we would've lost countless lives, and my husband his crown.
In so doing, you may save countless lives, as I have done in my time.
If you have not actually killed you sure thought countless times about it!
I was able to confront each of my mistakes... and I realized I would have to point myself in the right direction from then on.
So, so, so, so sorry. For all the countless times I've left you holding your dick, I am sorry.
